import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assests/crown.svg'; import './header.styles.scss'; const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
{ hidden }
) const mapStateToProps = ({user: { currentUser }, cart: { hidden }})=> ({ currentUser, hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
